text: Hit After Hit is the debut album from The Briefs, released in 2000 on both CD and white, red, pink, and clear vinyl. ==Track listing== # Poor and Weird # Run the Other Way # Silver Bullet # Rotten Love # I'm a Raccoon # Sylvia # Where Did He Go? # New Shoes # Knife # Year Long Summer # New Case # Big Dog # Dolly Parton Category:2000 debut albums Category:Albums produced by Martin Feveyear Category:The Briefs albums Category:BYO Records albums
title: Hit After Hit
